snippet: Hunter Roberts Construction Group admitted it had bilked its clients on plum projects by padding the hours and inflating the rates it charged over eight years.
abstract: Hunter Roberts Construction Group admits to widespread overbilling scheme that affected number of projects in New York City over a period of eight years; agrees to pay $7 million to settle charges.
lead_paragraph: Hunter Roberts Construction Group admitted it had bilked its clients on plum projects by padding the hours and inflating the rates it charged over eight years.

headline.main: Construction Company Admits to Defrauding New York Clients
headline.print_headline: Construction Company Says It Bilked Clients
